ai.summary: A very short, easy 0.2 km hike at Carn Brea FP 13 in the UK. This quick stroll offers a moment of outdoor scenery near the Carn Brea area and is suitable for all ages and fitness levels.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-defined paths with a gentle incline in places. Surfaces include paved sections and compacted gravel with occasional uneven patches. Some viewpoints may involve small steps or ledges near the lookout.
ai.safety_notes: Despite the short distance, stay on marked paths, watch footing on uneven ground and near edges. Weather in the UK can change rapidly; wear appropriate clothing and footwear. Keep away from steep drops and respect private property and any restricted areas near Carn Brea. Supervise children at all times.
ai.best_seasons: All year round; spring and autumn are particularly pleasant for visibility and milder temperatures.
